name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. Center of mass and linear momentum (part 1)
2. Center of mass and linear momemtum (part 2)
3. Rotation (part 1)
4. Rotation (part 2)
5. Rolling, torque and angular momentum (part 1)
6. Exam 1
7. Rolling, torque and angular momentum (part 2)
8. Rolling, torque and angular momentum (part 3)
9. Equilibrium and elasticity (part 2)
10. Equilibrium and elasticity  (part 1)
11. Oscillations (part 1)
12. Exam 2
14. Oscillations (part 2)
15. Waves (part 1)
16. Waves (part 2)
17. Electric charge
18. Exam 3
materials:
”Fundamentals of Physics” by Halliday, Rensnick and Walker
8th Edition, Wiley (歐亞書局)
